member.name: T:ToyRobotConsole.Cell
member.summary: A Cell is a single location containing an x and y coordinate.

member.summary: Private field for x coordinate.

member.summary: Private field y coordinate.

member.summary: Read-only property for x coordinate.
member.value: Gets the value of x coordinate

member.summary: Read-only property for y coordinate.
member.value: Gets the value of y coordinate

member.summary: Cell constructor

An int parameter for the Cell's y coordinate

member.name: T:ToyRobotConsole.CommandProcessor
member.summary: The CommandProcessor class takes a command string, validates that it contains known commands and manages propagation of commands to the correct game elements.

member.name: F:ToyRobotConsole.CommandProcessor._game
member.summary: Private field for game.

member.name: M:ToyRobotConsole.CommandProcessor.#ctor(ToyRobotConsole.Game)
member.summary: Command Processor constructor
member.param: A game parameter to manage command propagation

member.name: M:ToyRobotConsole.CommandProcessor.Help
member.summary: Provides a list of suggestions for known commands
member.returns: A string representation of a list of known commands

member.name: M:ToyRobotConsole.CommandProcessor.Place(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the remaining command string and propagates to robot
member.param: A string containing the parameters of the place command

member.name: M:ToyRobotConsole.CommandProcessor.Execute(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the command string and propagates to appropriate game object

member.name: T:ToyRobotConsole.Robot
member.summary: The Robot class contains the functionality for the game's robot.

member.summary: The Warning enum contains a list of known warning messages.

member.name: F:ToyRobotConsole.Robot.Warning.INACTIVE
member.summary: The robot is inactive.

member.name: F:ToyRobotConsole.Robot.Warning.BOUNDARY
member.summary: The requested location is outside the boundary.

member.name: F:ToyRobotConsole.Robot.Warning.PLACE
member.summary: The requested location or direction does not exist.
